segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I notice the woman totally oblivious to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate like it's the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet is on full blast, and water is spilling out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle is growing so fast; someone could slip and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that shaky stool, stretching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll come crashing down with those cookies flying everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting there, not helping to steady him at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't heard the water splashing yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cabinets are getting soaked; this could ruin the whole kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are risking so much just for a few treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is calm, but in here it's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This makes my heart race just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR
